title: Champion that is bought is not there.
body:
After opening chests and receiving a Jhin champion shard I decided to buy him permanently for a couple of BE instead of buying him through the store for full price. After playing a game with him to end my night I open up the next day for another round with Jhin only to realize that I don't have him in my champion collection (My BE is deducted as if I bought him).
This isn't the first time this problem happened, in fact this is the second, my first time was a long time ago with Fiddle Sticks (He vanished from my champion pool as well) only I didn't care much because I didn't play League a lot at the time.

replies.body: I can see where you got Jhin in that milestone capsule on the 24th, but you didn't actually turn him into a permanent. You disenchanted that shard for 1260 Blue Essence. No worries, I've gone ahead and added back that shard so you could unlock him this time!
Thanks for looking into the case for me even though I was wrong you still helped me out, I appreciate that.
That is how you do it.
